A. Only owner-based sharing rules are recalculated.

When reassigning Account owners using the Mass Transfer tool, the following two processing steps are triggered:

A. Only owner-based sharing rules are recalculated: When an owner is changed using the Mass Transfer tool, the owner-based sharing rules for the Account are recalculated to ensure that the new owner has the appropriate level of access to the record.

B. Manual sharing is updated to reflect the new owner: Any manual sharing that was previously granted to the record is updated to reflect the new owner. For example, if a user had previously shared an Account record with a specific user or group, and the owner of the record is changed using the Mass Transfer tool, the sharing settings will be updated so that the shared user or group is still able to access the record.

BD is the correct answer.
